definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]

sentences.english: In 1222 they entered Europe, defeating Russian and Bulgarian armies.
sentences.chinese: 1222年，他們進入歐洲擊敗俄軍和保加利亞軍隊。

sentences.english: I wandered around the tanks. Young Russian soldiers were sitting in the open hatches.
sentences.chinese: 在坦克附近轉了轉，看到年輕的俄軍士兵坐在艙口。

sentences.english: Let’s see what Russian Army will look like in a couple of years.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們看看俄軍在未來一兩年內會變成什麼樣子。

definition: the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan
Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
the Mukden or Manchurian Railway Incident of 18th September 1931 used by the Japanese as a pretext to annex Manchuria/also known as Liutiaogou incident 柳條溝事變|柳条沟事变
Treaty of Shimonoseki (1895), concluding the First Sino-Japanese War 甲午戰爭|甲午战争[Jia3 wu3 Zhan4 zheng1]
